body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting ABC Car Dealership. My name is Juan Adams. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Karen. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two one zero, three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Karen. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I was just inquiring about the pricing. I'm feeling sad about the high costs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Karen. We appreciate your feedback and will work to address any concerns you have. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye and have a great day!
